scripts: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS Department CASCADE;
CREATE TABLE Department (id INTEGER, name TEXT);
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS Employee CASCADE;
CREATE TABLE Employee (id INTEGER, full_name TEXT, salary INTEGER, department INTEGER);
